subject: "Reminiscent Regimen" Event: Island Co-Op Challenges
content:
During the event, head to the Golden Apple Archipelago and face the challenges within mirages. Complete designated challenges and accrue as many points as possible to obtain rewards such as Primogems, Hero's Wit, Talent Level-Up Materials, and Mora.


〓Event Duration〓

2022/08/04 10:00:00 – 2022/08/15 03:59:59


〓Eligibility〓

1. Adventure Rank 32 or above

2. Complete the quest "Summertime Odyssey: I"


〓Event Details〓

● The "Reminiscent Regimen" challenge has three themes: Descent, Raid, and Convoy. Each theme has 2 challenges respectively and 6 levels in total. After the event begins, one challenge level will be unlocked each day. Travelers can participate by forming a custom Co-Op party or select Co-Op Mode to begin matching.

● Each challenge theme also has unique challenge objectives. Complete them and obtain a specific amount of points to obtain rewards such as Primogems, Hero's Wit, Talent Level-Up Materials, and Mora. Travelers can confirm the challenge objectives for each challenge on the Score Details page in Challenge Details.

● The Descent challenge requires Travelers to start from a platform high in the sky and begin a descending assault. Defeat all opponents on various floating platforms and reach the sea surface within the time limit to complete the challenge.

● The Raid challenge requires Travelers to navigate your Waverider to reach a certain sea region, board floating platforms, and defeat all opponents on them within a time limit to complete the challenge.

● The Convoy challenge requires Travelers to protect a Driftstone Raft that will automatically move towards a destination. If the Raft reaches its destination within the time limit without being destroyed, the challenge is a success.

subject: Genshin Impact EP - Brilliance of Blooming Fireworks
content:
The sun sets over the western hills and the evening stars illuminate the summer night.

The long-awaited fireworks finally soar into the sky, burning brighter than the moonlight and shining brighter than the stars tonight.

subject: "Reminiscent Regimen" Gameplay Details
content:
The new event "Reminiscent Regimen" is about to begin!


Mirages that derive from various adventure experiences have quietly appeared somewhere in the Golden Apple Archipelago. Face the challenges within them and hone your adventuring skills!



New missions have also been added to Azure Main. Complete them to receive BEP.


〓Event Duration〓

2022/08/04 10:00 – 2022/08/15 03:59 (Server Time)


〓Eligibility〓

1. Adventure Rank 32 or above

2. Complete the quest "Summertime Odyssey: I"


〓Gameplay Overview〓

subject: "Evermotion Mechanical Painting" Event: Restore the Mechanical Painting and Obtain Primogems
content:
During the event, help Félix Yogue, a person from the Court of Fontaine, to resolve his problems. Restore the Mechanical Painting Parts and combine them into an Evermotion Mechanical Painting to obtain rewards such as Primogems, a Furnishing, Hero's Wit, Weapon Ascension Materials, and Mora.


〓Event Duration〓

2022/08/12 10:00:00 – 2022/08/22 03:59:59


〓Eligibility〓

1. Adventure Rank 18 or above

2. Complete the Archon Quest "Prologue: Act III - Song of the Dragon and Freedom"


〓Event Details〓

● During the event, you can use Félix Yogue's special workbench to restore the Mechanical Painting Parts.

● From the first day of the event, a new part that can be restored will unlock every day. A total of six parts need to be restored in sequence.

● After restoring all six Mechanical Painting Parts, you must place the Parts at the right angles and specific locations to restore the Evermotion Mechanical Painting. After the restoration is complete, you can obtain rewards such as Primogems, a Furnishing, Hero's Wit, and Mora.


※ If you exit the interface while the Mechanical Painting Parts restoration process or the piecing process of the Evermotion Mechanical Painting is ongoing, the restoration progress will not be saved.

subject: "Evermotion Mechanical Painting" Gameplay Details
content:
"Evermotion Mechanical Painting" is about to begin! During the event, help Félix Yogue, a person from the Court of Fontaine, to resolve his problems. Restore the Mechanical Painting Parts and combine them into an Evermotion Mechanical Painting to obtain rewards such as Primogems, a Furnishing, Hero's Wit, Weapon Ascension Materials, and Mora.



New missions have also been added to Azure Main. Complete them to receive BEP.


〓Event Duration〓

2. Complete the Archon Quest "Prologue: Act III - Song of the Dragon and Freedom"


〓Gameplay Overview〓

subject: "HoYo Quiz 2.0" New Gameplay Details
content:
Hello, everyone! The "HoYo Quiz 2.0" contest will have a double upgrade of benefits and gameplay, so let Mimo introduce it to you!

Upgraded Benefits:

The original game mode remains unchanged,

but the number of participants in each game will be increased to 20,000! (Additional spots may be added for special events)

The Primogem reward that each participant can get in each round is increased to Primogems ×1,500!

The number of Primogem rewards distributed to spectators in each match will be increased to 40 sets of Primogems ×60!

New "Quiz Team" gameplay: Be active in the community (such as posting or replying to posts, etc.) or participate in answering questions, and you have a chance to win Primogems, merchandise, and community-limited virtual items!

In addition, those with outstanding performances in this year's "HoYo Quiz" contest series (e.g. have outstanding competition results or made outstanding contributions to the topic #HoYoQuiz) will receive a "HoYo Quiz Certificate of Honor" and have the opportunity to participate in a global live broadcast of the "Genshin Impact" quiz tournament in October this year with globally-renowned influencers.


New Gameplay:

1. "Magic Eraser" Tool

- The "Magic Eraser" (hereinafter referred to as "tool") is a tool intended for use in the HoYo Quiz. When answering questions, simply click the tool button to randomly erase an incorrect answer from the question.

When your friend signs up or returns to HoYoLAB and enters your invitation code on the "HoYo Quiz 2.0 event page", both you and your friend will receive a tool (The HoYo Quiz 2.0 event page is expected to go live in late August.)

(This page is under development and is not indicative of the final product.)


2. "Quiz Team" Gameplay:

Gameplay Details:

- Beginning with "HoYo Quiz 2.0," teams will compete weekly for "Contest Win Rate" and "Topic Popularity Points." Members of the winning team will have the opportunity to win Primogems, merchandise, and community-limited virtual items.

- The "Contest Win Rate" is the average winning rate of the team members in the week, i.e. the number of team members who answered all questions correctly in the week / the number of team members who participated in the match ×100%. If there are two matches in a week, the average of the "Contest Win Rate" of the two contest matches will be the team's result for the week.

- "Topic Popularity Points" represent the average level of popularity points per member under the team topic for a week, that is: (the number of posts under the team topic + the number of comments + the number of favorites + number of likes) / number of team members.


Reward Details:

- Teams can win by achieving the highest "Contest Win Rate" or the highest "Topic Popularity Points" for the week. 40 random members of the winning team will receive a prize of Primogems ×60, and 40 random members will receive a merchandise gift (the specific merchandise will depend on the prize pool of the week).

- If a team wins for the first time with "Contest Win Rate" or the "Topic Popularity Points," all team members will receive a "HoYo Quiz 2.0 Event-Exclusive Avatar Frame." If they win again, all team members will receive a "HoYo Quiz 2.0 Event-Exclusive Emoji Set."

- All members who join the team (i.e. vote through the voting mechanic below) will receive an additional "Exclusive Profile Page Background Image" of the corresponding team.

Team Selection:

- Three teams will be formed in the contest: "#Team Courage," "#Team Wisdom," and "#Team Power."

- From now until August 19, 23:59 (UTC+8), you can join your preferred team by voting through the voting mechanism below (please note that once you have voted, it is no longer possible to change teams.)

#Team Courage: "Become a brave warrior, we are fearless!"

#Team Wisdom: "Only wisdom can unravel those ancient mysteries..."

#Team Power: "Please show your determination and great power to shine brightly!"

Other Details:

Additional Notes for "Magic Eraser":

1. During this year's HoYo Quiz series, each returning user can only be invited once until the end of the event, and can only receive one tool by being invited. However, each user can invite friends repeatedly and receive up to 25 tools.

2. There may be a delay of one business day in the sending out of tools and updating of the "Successfully Invited Friends" list.

3. In order to guarantee fairness during the contest, each participant can only use two tools per match and one tool per question.

4. The tools obtained can be used during the year until the end of the HoYo Quiz series of events.


Additional Notes for "Quiz Team":

1. If a single team has won the highest "Contest Winning Rate" and "Topic Popularity Points" for the week, they will receive a total of 80 sets of Primogems ×60 and 80 sets of merchandise. If multiple teams are tied, the reward will be divided among all tied teams.

2. Mimo will post the results of that week's team competition every Sunday.

3. The "Topic Popularity Points" published every Sunday is calculated from 00:00 on Sunday of the previous week to 23:59 (UTC+8) on Saturday of the current week. The "Contest Winning Rate" published every Sunday is taken from the matches on Saturday of the same week.

4. In order to ensure the fairness of the competition, if the number of a single team reaches 2 times the number of any other team, the team will temporarily close the joining channel.


Reward Issuance Details:

1. Please pay attention to the forum messages to be notified of reward issuance. Community virtual items are expected to be issued within 7 business days, and Primogems and merchandise rewards are expected to be issued within 45 business days.

2. Each week, a single user can win up to one set of Primogems or merchandise with the team's Contest Win Rate" or "Topic Popularity Points."


To learn more about "HoYo Quiz 2.0," please click [here] for more details on how to play and watch the match.

subject: Version 3.0 "The Morn a Thousand Roses Brings" Trailer | Genshin Impact
content:
See with thine eyes the luxuriant verdure embowering the mountains,

Savor with thine nose the fragrant roses overlaying the meadows.

Hear the larking of flamboyant birds at daybreak,

Hear them unveil wisdom silenced for centuries.

subject: Sumeru Live Symphony Performance | Genshin Impact
content:
This Sumeru Live Symphony Performance was filmed at the Alexandra Palace Theatre. The performance features London Symphony Orchestra, the oldest symphony orchestra in London, and top folk musicians performing Sumeru's regional pieces "Sumeru" and "Swirls of Shamshir" together.

——————————————————

Music Production: HOYO-MiX

Composer: Yu-Peng Chen @HOYO-MiX


Live Performance:

Orchestra Performance: London Symphony Orchestra

Music Producers: Robert Ziegler, Kuljit Bhamra (folk music)

Location: Alexandra Palace Theatre

subject: Announcement for the First "HoYo Quiz 2.0" Match: Watch or Join a Team to Win Primogem Prizes!
content:
Hi there! The first match of "HoYo Quiz 2.0" will take place on August 20, 22:00 (UTC+8). To celebrate the start of the contest, spectators will have the opportunity to obtain additional Primogem rewards or merchandise prizes!

The first match between the three teams will also take place this week! The members of the winning team will get great rewards, let's check it out together~

>> HoYo Quiz 2.0 Event Page <<

Contest Details:


"HoYo Quiz 2.0" Match 1


Start Time: August 20, 22:00 (UTC+8)

Participant Quota: 20,000

Prize Pool: Primogems ×650,000

Spectator Benefits: Primogems ×60 (40 sets)


To celebrate the start of the first match, Mimo will randomly select 20 spectators to offer them a Fateful Gift Series Coaster (1 set) merchandise! Maybe you will be one of the lucky winners~


Team Gameplay:


The first contest between the three teams will take place this Saturday (August 20)!

If a team achieves the highest "Contest Winning Rate" or achieves the most "Topic Popularity Points" in the week, 40 of their randomly-chosen team members will receive Primogems ×60, 40 of their randomly-chosen members will receive a set of Genshin Impact's "Gift" series coasters, and all its members will receive an exclusive "HoYo Quiz 2.0" avatar frame! (The results of the contest between the teams will be announced in a post during the following week.)

If you haven't joined a team yet, you can click [here] to do so by voting~

To warm up before team contest, Mimo has prepared a prize giveaway event for you. Start discussions related to teams or Genshin Impact for a chance to earn great merchandise rewards!


Event Duration:

August 16 – August 30, 23:59 (UTC+8)


How to Participate:

In this event, you can assume one of two roles: "Initiator" or "Participant."

Initiators should post a discussion post under their team's topic (e.g.: #Team Courage," "#Team Wisdom," or "#Team Power) and topic #HoYo Quiz, as well as include "Discussion Post" in the title.

The content of this post should be related to the team (e.g.: "Call for the best team slogans") or Genshin Impact in-game content (e.g.: "A sentence that proves that you are a Genshin Impact player").


"Participants" must interact according to the content of the post and the format given by the "Initiators."


Event Rewards:

Mimo will offer merchandise rewards to eligible "Initiators" and "Participants" under the following conditions.

Initiators: During the event, the 15 initiators with the most comments and 15 other randomly selected initiators will each receive a "Xiangling Guoba Noodle Bowl for One" merchandise reward.

Participants: 15 participants will be randomly selected to receive a Zhongli Impression Series Woven Bracelet.


Notes:

1. Users must follow HoYoLAB community rules when posting, otherwise they will not be eligible to win.

2. Each HoYoLAB account can win only one merchandise prize during the event.

3. If the "Initiator" publishes multiple pieces of content within the event time, the number of comments will be the sum of the number of comments on multiple posts (including the building within the building). Comments deleted during the active time are not included in the total.

4. The list of winners of the warm-up event will be announced from September 15th. Please pay attention to the forum messages for the delivery information of merchandise rewards.

#Team Courage

#Team Wisdom

#Team Power

subject: Listen to the OST to Earn Primogems - "Ballads of the World": The Shimmering Voyage Vol. 2 OST Album Event Is Now Available!
content:
Click here to enjoy the soundtracks and win Primogems, an event-exclusive avatar frame, and other rewards~

https://hoyo.link/b98P6HA6

For travelers who explore the world,

there are countless sights to remember,

and together with the memories,

are nostalgic songs that come to mind...


[Event Duration]

August 16, 2022 – August 21, 2022 23:59 (UTC+8)


[How to Participate]

1. Head over to the page and click to play at least three tracks in the OST album.

2. Click "Share to Win Primogems" at the bottom of the current page and choose a social media platform to share it to your personal social media homepage.

*Please note that your personal social media homepage is required to be made public.


[Event Rewards]

Among Travelers who have listened to the soundtracks and successfully shared the event, the first 3 million participants will be selected and gifted with Primogems ×40 and an event-exclusive HoYoLAB avatar frame!

*Primogem rewards are limited to 3 million sets and will be distributed on a first-come, first-served basis. The event-exclusive HoYoLAB avatar frame will be available for a permanent period!

We will inform you of the redemption codes for Primogems via HoYoLAB's forum message before August 24, 2022 23:59 (UTC+8). The winners can redeem the received codes on the Genshin Impact official website or in-game.

The Primogems redemption code is valid until August 31, 2022 23:59 (UTC+8). Winners who miss the deadline will be deemed to have forfeited their rewards, so don't forget to claim the rewards in time!


[Event Rules]

1. Travelers are allowed to participate multiple times in this event, but can only win the rewards once. The rewards will not be stacked.

2. Due to the large number of winners, a list of winners will not be published. Please pay attention to private messages on HoYoLAB from August 22 to August 24, 2022 23:59 (UTC+8) to confirm the reward information. Redemption codes will be valid until August 31, 2022 23:59 (UTC+8), after which rewards will be considered forfeited. Please wait patiently for the reward information and check your private message mailbox regularly.

3. After sharing the event to your personal social media homepage, tagging content that violates laws, regulations, or community rules along the shared post is prohibited.

subject: Sumeru Adventure Journal Vol. 1: Dendro Element
content:
Hello, Travelers~

In the upcoming Version 3.0, the nation of wisdom - Sumeru will open its doors to you. Let's see what interesting things await you in this new area!

subject: Sumeru Adventure Journal Vol. 2: Fantastic Creatures Are Found Here
content:
Hello, Travelers! In this issue, we will introduce some special creatures in the Sumeru region.P.S.

For Travelers who don't like spoilers, do consider skipping this diary~

subject: "The value of knowledge cannot simply be quantified in monetary terms."
content:
Hello Travelers~ Today, we will be introducing a new character, Tighnari!


A young researcher well-versed in botany who currently serves as a Forest Watcher in Avidya Forest. He is a straight shooter with a warm heart — and a dab hand at guiding even the dullest of pupils.

subject: Character Teaser - "Tighnari: When All Is Said" | Genshin Impact
content:
Due to his particularly well-developed sense of hearing, Tighnari rarely goes to the bustling Sumeru City.

For this reason, he turned down many invitations from the city.

However, when the invitation comes from his mentor, it is important to respond earnestly and sincerely.

subject: Voice Artist Announcement
content:
"Which muddlehead has been eating poisonous mushrooms again? Let me talk to him."

Travelers, come listen to the voice of the "Verdant Strider" Tighnari!


Voice Artist

EN VA: Elliot Gindi

JP VA: KOBAYASHI Sanae


After the new version is updated, we invite you to listen to the voice lines of the characters on the official site! Stay tuned!

subject: More surprises await you in this summer where we feast on delicacies!
content:
Dear Travelers,

This summer, an exciting long-term collaboration event is undergoing preparations~ More online item rewards and cuisine recipes will be released in full~ Please check out our official social media channels for more event details when it is released, stay tuned!

More surprises await you in this summer where we feast on delicacies!

subject: Sumeru Adventure Journal Vol. 3: "Puzzles" in the Forest
content:
Hello, Travelers! During your exploration in Sumeru, you will come across new gameplay mechanics and modes, let's check them out!

P.S. This journal contains information on how to solve the puzzles for some mechanisms. For Travelers who don't like spoilers, do consider skipping this journal~


That's it for this edition of the Sumeru Adventure Journal. We will reveal more tomorrow, so stay tuned!

subject: "Vulpes Zerda Chapter" Story Quest Overview
content:
Travelers who reach the required Adventure Rank and complete the prerequisite quests will be able to use a "Story Key" to unlock Tighnari's Story Quest "Vulpes Zerda Chapter."


The Story Quest feature is unlocked at Adventure Rank 26. "Story Keys" are obtained by completing Daily Commissions (one Story Key is awarded for every eight commissions completed.)



〓Quest Start Time〓

Permanently available after the Version 3.0 update



〓Quest Unlock Criteria〓

1. Adventure Rank 40 or above

2. Complete Archon Quest "Chapter III: Act II - The Morn a Thousand Roses Brings: Denouement"

subject: "Graven Innocence" Event: Take Part to Invite "Sprout of Rebirth" Collei (Dendro)
content:
During the event, complete the quest "The Unappreciated Carving" to invite the character "Sprout of Rebirth" Collei (Dendro). Help the staff in Acara Crafts find assistants and collect inspiration regarding toy-making to obtain Primogems, Crown of Insight, Character Level-Up Materials, Talent Level-Up Materials, event-exclusive Furnishings, etc.


〓Event Duration〓


〓Eligibility〓

Adventure Rank 20 or above

And complete "The Trail of the God of Wisdom" in Archon Quest Chapter III: Act I "Through Mists of Smoke and Forests Dark"


※ Complete Archon Quest "The Trail of the God of Wisdom" to best enjoy the event.

※ If you have not completed the Archon Quest "The Trail of the God of Wisdom" during the event, you can enter the event through "Quick Start" in the event page after completing the Archon Quest "Prologue: Act I - The Outlander Who Caught the Wind."

 

〓Event Details〓

● Complete the quest "The Unappreciated Carving" during the event to invite the character "Sprout of Rebirth" Collei (Dendro), and unlock events like "Meticulous Craftsmanship," "Roaming the Jungle," "Metamorphosis of Wood," etc.

● "Roaming the Jungle" includes gameplay like Snapshots, Behemoth Observation, Grove Dash, and Braving the Elements. These gameplay modes will be unlocked over the course of the event.

● In the Behemoth Observation of "Roaming the Jungle," the challenge quest can only be completed by challenging the Electro Regisvine and Jadeplume Terrorshroom in the wilds.

● Complete various quests in "Roaming the Jungle" to get "Whimsical Drafts" and "Creative Notes," which can be used to exchange for Carving Components, Primogems, Crown of Insight, Character Level-Up Materials, Talent Level-Up Materials,etc.

● Go to the showcase in "Metamorphosis of Wood" and use Carving Components to assemble an Aranara Woodcarving. Complete the quest to get corresponding rewards. There is a limit to the number of carvings that can be displayed, though this number will increase as the event progresses.

● After the event gameplay period ends, Whimsical Drafts and Creative Notes will disappear. Please make sure to claim the rewards in time.

subject: Event Wish "Viridescent Vigil" - Boosted Drop Rate for "Verdant Strider" Tighnari (Dendro)!
content:
.

Travelers, stock up on weapons and characters in the event wish to make your party stronger in combat!



〓Event Wish Duration〓

After the Version 3.0 update–2022/09/09 17:59:00


〓Event Wish Details〓

● During this event wish, the 5-star character "Verdant Strider" Tighnari (Dendro) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

● During this event wish, the four-star characters "Sprout of Rebirth" Collei (Dendro), "Kätzlein Cocktail" Diona (Cryo), and "Prinzessin der Verurteilung!" Fischl (Electro) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

※ This is for "Character Event Wish." The wish guarantee count is shared by "Character Event Wish" and "Character Event Wish-2," and is accumulated between both "Character Event Wish" and "Character Event Wish-2." This wish guarantee count is independent of the guarantee counts of other types of wishes.

※ The "Test Run" trial event will be open during this event wish. Travelers may use fixed lineups containing the selected trial characters to enter specific stages and test them out. Travelers that complete the challenges will receive the corresponding rewards!

※ For more information, go to the Wish page and select Details in the bottom-left corner.

subject: New Story Unlocked - Archon Quest Chapter III: Act I and Act II
content:
"There was the Door to which I found no Key; There was the Veil through which I might not see: Some little talk awhile of Me and TheeThere was--and then no more of Thee and Me."


"Each Morn a thousand Roses brings, you say: Yes, but where leaves the Rose of Yesterday?"


After reaching the corresponding Adventure Rank and completing the prerequisite quests, Archon Quest Chapter III: Act I "Through Mists of Smoke and Forests Dark" and Act II "The Morn a Thousand Roses Brings" will appear in the Quest Menu.


(After this quest is unlocked, access the Quest Menu by: pressing "J" on PC (default settings); tapping the Quest Menu icon in the upper-left corner on mobile; or pressing and holding L1 on PS5™ or PS4™ to open the shortcut wheel and select the Quest Menu icon.)



〓Quest Start Time〓

After the Version 3.0 update, Archon Quests Chapter III: Act I "Through Mists of Smoke and Forests Dark" and Chapter III: Act II "The Morn a Thousand Roses Brings" will be permanently available.


〓Archon Quest Chapter III: Act I "Through Mists of Smoke and Forests Dark" Unlock Criteria〓

• Reach Adventure Rank 35 or above

• Complete Archon Quest Chapter II: Act IV "Requiem of the Echoing Depths"


〓Archon Quest Chapter III: Act II "The Morn a Thousand Roses Brings" Unlock Criteria〓

• Reach Adventure Rank 35 or above

• Complete Archon Quest Chapter III: Act I "Through Mists of Smoke and Forests Dark"

subject: "Trainee Forest Ranger Collei, reporting!" — "Sprout of Rebirth" Collei
content:
Hello Travelers~ The character we are introducing today is a trainee ranger active in Avidya Forest, Collei!

"Helpful," "bright and sunny," "friendly and passionate"... Just ask around Gandharva Ville, and you'll hear this Trainee Forest Ranger praised to the skies in such terms.

subject: Version 3.0 Events Preview - Phase I
content: Hello, Travelers~ Version 3.0 is coming! Let's take a look at what kind of wonderful events will be in this new Version update~

subject: Character Demo - "Collei: Sprout in the Thicket" | Genshin Impact
content:
If there hadn't been a written test, Collei would have gotten a good grade on her wilderness survival exam.

It's not just about protecting yourself, helping others is what counts.

subject: Voice Artist Announcement
content:
"Trainee Forest Ranger Collei, reporting!"

Travelers, let's listen to the voice of "Sprout of Rebirth" Collei!


Voice Artist

EN VA:Christina Costello

JP VA: MAEKAWA Ryoko


After the new version is updated, we invite you to listen to the voice lines of the characters on the official site! Stay tuned!

subject: Of red sands and glimmering gold, her vow to defend stands strong
content:
"I once gave Candace some jewelry and told her to learn to enjoy life and find happiness outside of work. She replied that seeing the village in peace was enough to make her happy... Well, this guardian really has a unique way of enjoying life..."

— An exasperated comment from Dehya, the Flame-Mane.


◆ Candace

◆ Golden Vow

◆ Guardian of Aaru Village

◆ Hydro

◆ Sagitta Scutum



"That Candace... is a true descendant of King Deshret!"

At a tavern in Sumeru City, a disheveled member of The Eremites exclaimed in fear.

The guardian with different-colored eyes has received the blessing of the gods and is able to summon a sandstorm that engulfs all enemies instantly.

A former member of the Treasure Hoarders, who recently claimed to have quit, added that Candace can also summon the power of the desert. Every grain of sand is her scout and no one can escape from her grasp.

But a young adventurer who was about to leave for the desert looked surprised. He replied that Miss Candace, the guardian of Aaru Village, was actually a gentle and caring person.

During a visit to Aaru Village, he had seen Miss Candace bring water and food to a hungry Treasure Hoarder, and arranged for another exhausted mercenary to rest in the guest room... In the eyes of this adventurer, "terrifying" is the last word one could use to describe this guardian...

Candace, who is far away in the Great Red Sand, was unaware of this little debate about her - although she doesn't mind what people think about her.

As the guardian of Aaru Village, it is her duty to protect the peace of the village.

As long as they abide by the rules of Aaru Village, anyone can seek refuge here and receive the help they need.

As for those who violate the rules and commit atrocities in the village...

Candace will personally ensure that they never harm the village again.

subject: The law is just, and there is no escape for the guilty
content:
"Many researchers at the Akademiya fear that the General Mahamatra will interfere with their research. However, it seems that they are worrying about nothing. Most of them do not produce results worthy of his visit."

— A reply given by Forest Watcher Tighnari when Collei asked a question about the General Mahamatra.


◆ Cyno

◆ Judicator of Secrets

◆ General Mahamatra

◆ Electro

◆ Lupus Aureus


If an Akademiya researcher is required to have a formal meeting with the General Mahamatra, Cyno, it usually does not bode well.

In general, a personal visit from Cyno implies that these researchers are perpetrators of serious academic offences: plagiarism, bribery, academic fraud, false declarations, misappropriation of funds, malicious competition, appropriation of someone else's dissertations, and more... The only thing left for these researchers to do is to follow the General Mahamatra and face disciplinary action.

But these researchers will not accept their sentence so easily.

Most of them try to bribe the General Mahamatra with Mora. These "wealthy people" will then be punished even more severely. Meanwhile, some choose to use force in an irrational act of recalcitrance... After paying the price for their defiance, they are subjected to a harsher sentence.

Others, at their wits' end, even feign madness, claiming memory loss or pleading insanity in a desperate attempt to escape punishment.

However, General Mahamatra Cyno has unfailing patience when dealing with these people. In his own words:

"As a Matra, it is one of my duties to help people 'remember' the mistakes they have made."

subject: The dance of the lotus blooms, awakening from an ethereal dream
content:
"What's so great about that little theater? If she went with me on tour all around Teyvat, she could earn so much Mora, more than what she could ever dream of... Alas, she's too innocent. So innocent that she knows nothing of her own worth." — Dori


◆ Nilou

◆ Dance of Lotuslight

◆ Star of Zubayr Theater

◆ Hydro

◆ Lotos Somno



If you have time, don't miss the performance at the Zubayr Theater.

Against a backdrop of lights and music, Nilou's graceful demeanor resembles that of an unsullied lotus flower, her delicate dance leading the audience into a world of fantasy.

When the performance comes to an end, the audience is brought back to reality, often in a trance.

"The girl dancing on stage is so beautiful, she looks straight out of a fairy tale."

But those who are close to Nilou know that she is very different from the aloof image she portrays on stage.

Once Nilou steps off the stage, she is like any girl her age: sweet, warm, and smiling.

If you meet Nilou off-stage, don't be intimidated. Say hello to her, and she'll be very happy about it.

subject: "Graven Innocence" Gameplay Details
content:
The new event "Graven Innocence" is about to begin! In Port Ormos, Sumeru, there is a shop named Acara Crafts. One can hear the many sighs of craftsmen within...

New missions have also been added to Luxuriant Woodlands. Complete them to receive BEP.


〓Event Duration〓

Gameplay Duration: After the Version 3.0 update – End of Version 3.0 (Server Time)

Event Shop Duration: After the Version 3.0 update – End of Version 3.0 (Server Time)


〓Eligibility〓

Adventure Rank 20 or above

And complete "The Trail of the God of Wisdom" in Archon Quest Chapter III: Act I "Through Mists of Smoke and Forests Dark"


※ Complete Archon Quest "The Trail of the God of Wisdom" to best enjoy the event.

※ If you have not completed the Archon Quest "The Trail of the God of Wisdom" during the event, you can enter the event through "Quick Start" in the event page after completing the Archon Quest Prologue: Act I - "The Outlander Who Caught the Wind."


〓Gameplay Details〓

subject: Version 3.0 "The Morn a Thousand Roses Brings" New Artifact Overview
content: Hello Travelers~! Today, Paimon wants to introduce you to the brand-new equipment that will be appearing in Version 3.0! Come on, let's take a look~

subject: Character Demo - "Tighnari: Plant Patrol" | Genshin Impact
content:
According to the official classification, fungi are not plants.

However, since mushrooms are often picked and eaten freely by Vanara, they have become a mandatory part of the Forest Ranger training curriculum.

Though, when it comes to research on new species of fungi, it is better to leave it to the experienced Forest Watcher.

subject: Genshin Impact - Sumeru Gameplay Trailer｜Gamescom 2022
content: Embark on a new journey in Genshin Impact with Sumeru's gameplay trailer.

subject: New Enemies Have Appeared!
content:
Hello Travelers~

The "Graven Innocence" event has started. In "Roaming the Jungle: Behemoth Observation," Travelers will face two all-new enemies: the Electro Regisvine and Jadeplume Terrorshroom. What unique features do they have? How should they be defeated? Let's take a look~

subject: Collected Miscellany - "Tighnari: Lush Verdure" | Genshin Impact
content:
Plants cannot speak, but they have their own "language."

Those who can understand them will become friends of the forest.

subject: Collected Miscellany - "Collei: Sunny Green Fields" | Genshin Impact
content:
Leaving literacy aside, Collei is very fond of reading children's picture books.

Their stories are lively and their illustrations are vivid, just like green fields that glisten in the sun.

subject: Cutscene Animation: "Dance of Sabzeruz" | Genshin Impact
content:
The Sabzeruz Festival was originally the Goddess of Flowers' birthday celebration for the Greater Lord.

It is said that during the birthday celebration of the Dendro Archon, the Goddess of Flowers performed a dance, and countless beautiful Padisarahs began to bloom wherever she stepped.

And now, Nilou will recreate this mesmerizing scene in the legend with her ethereal dance.

content:

subject: "Historia Naturalis Sumeru" Short Video Submission Event
content:
Hello, Travelers!

The Sumeru map is now available, what are the beautiful landscapes that make you want to immortalize them? Share with us your favorite Sumeru landscapes as a short video!


The "Historia Naturalis Sumeru" Short Video Submission Event is now open. We are looking forward to your wonderful video creations!


[Event Duration]

August 30, 2022 – September 11, 2022 23:59 (UTC+8)

Results: The list of winners will be updated in this event post on September 29.


[How to Participate]

Use the hashtags "#ExploreSumeru" and "#GenshinImpact" while posting videos of in-game scenery that meet the requirements on TikTok or YouTube, and you will be considered a successful participant.


[Submission Criteria]

1. The original video submissions must be taken in Sumeru.

2. Your UID must be clearly visible in your work or video title.


[Event Rewards]

Primogems ×600 (40 winners)


[Other Details]

1. Publishing content that violates laws, regulations, or community rules (including but not limited to advertisement links and other means of publicity) is prohibited.

2. Travelers are allowed multiple submissions for this event, but only one prize can be won per Traveler. The prizes cannot be stacked and only the highest prize won will be awarded.

3. This event will be evaluated based on the submission's content, comments, likes, and other factors.

4. Your submission will not be entered into the contest if the content does not relate to the event. If the title of your post does not meet the criteria, the winner may be disqualified from receiving the prize.

5. If the same entry wins on multiple platforms, the prize will be issued according to the platform it was first posted on after final verification (only one prize will be issued).

6. Plagiarism, misappropriation, and other actions that violate others' copyright are strictly prohibited. If there is a quote or a need for authorization, please cite the original sources and make sure to obtain authorization.

7. By participating in this event, you agree to have your UID and Nickname published on the event platform. UIDs will only be used to issue Primogem rewards to winning players and will be protected in accordance with the legal and policy provisions of local privacy protection laws.

8. If the issuance of rewards fails due to the player providing the wrong UID, the official Genshin Impact team will not re-issue the reward.

subject: "Lost Riches" Event: Trade Treasure for "Mini Seelie"!
content:
During the event, partner with the "Treasure-Seeking Seelie" to seek out treasure that can be exchanged in the Event Shop for one of the commemorative event gadgets: "Mini Seelie: Moss," "Mini Seelie: Viola," "Mini Seelie: Dayflower," "Mini Seelie: Rosé," and "Mini Seelie: Curcuma"! Rewards such as Primogems, Talent Level-Up Materials, Weapon Ascension Materials, Hero's Wit, Mystic Enhancement Ore, and Mora can also be obtained! 


〓Event Duration〓

Event Start Time: 2022/09/02 10:00:00 – 2022/09/19 03:59:59

Event Shop Duration: 2022/09/02 10:00:00 – 2022/09/19 03:59:59


〓Eligibility〓

Adventure Rank 20 or above


〓Event Details〓

● During the event, check the treasure map within Ulman's Treasure Book. Follow the map to reach the area where the treasure is buried. Ulman will mark out one new area in this book each day, for a total of 6 treasure areas.

● Help the "Treasure-Seeking Seelie" absorb energy in various ways in the treasure area to help it restore vitality. For every 3 instances of elemental energy obtained, the "Treasure-Seeking Seelie" will indicate the whereabouts of the treasure once.

● Dig in a treasure area to find the treasure chest and claim rewards and the "Ancient Iron Coins" within.

● During the event, you can exchange "Ancient Iron Coins" for materials in the event shop. After the Event Shop closes, your remaining "Ancient Iron Coins" will disappear.


※ Upon completing Area 6, the Event Shop will open for the redemption of "Mini Seelie: Moss," "Mini Seelie: Viola," "Mini Seelie: Dayflower," "Mini Seelie: Rosé," and "Mini Seelie: Curcuma." During this event, Travelers may only exchange for one type, after which the remaining four will no longer be available. Each Mini Seelie can only be obtained once.
